text: Many details have been lost to history. It appears that the attack was carried out by some kind of wand user of some sort, possibly Aremian. Most of the damage was isolated to a festival just outside the city walls.

![Basil Nimble-Fingers](0,characters) and ![Solomon Moonfall](1,characters) were victims of this attack, and woke up in a field hospital with little to no memory of the occurrence. Shortly afterwards, ![Grandpa](2,characters) attacked the city proper.

Little is known about why Grandpa chose to attack ![Knork](0,settings), but many accounts of his methods remain. He, along with ![a similarly powerful minion](3,characters), destroyed buildings with beams of magical energy, focused from their eyes. He summoned an ogre to terrorize civilians.
Solomon and Basil escaped, and managed to rescue ![Quinn](4,characters) in the process.

![Freddy](5,characters) asked the party to start an alliance to stand against ![Grandpa](2,characters). To do this, he requested that they go to ![Tin Trove Mountain](2,settings) and find a retired knight who lives there, Sir George Grimcomb. Later, it would turn out that he was actually ![Georg](8,characters).
Given a cart and a horse named Strangles, the party went.

Along the way, they stopped in ![a small village, suffering from hepatitis](1,settings). ![Solomon](1,characters) helped them discover a cute for it, and they were on the road again the very next day.

At the lake on the mountain, the party discovered a cabin. Although it was in the spot they had planned to search for Georg nearly destroyed. In it was Mac the cat. Soon after, Georg returned, and ![Basil](0,characters) unintentionally disturbed ![Mac](6,characters), causing him to run away. Though disappointing, Georg seemed indifferent, and the journey continued on.

In ![Tin Trove Mine](4,settings), the party found the ![Psycho Bitch Goblins](7,characters), who were having a fashion show at the bottom of the mine. ![Their leader](10,characters) and ![Aesop](9,characters) were there too. After fighting off the Psycho Bitches, the party found a pile of gold and ![a dragon's egg](11,characters).

![Tsar Georg of Kolis](8,characters) lived a life tormented by his brother, ![Tsar Freddy](5,characters). In a dispute over the throne, Freddy smashed a lamp over Georg's head, and had him exiled. Freddy then spent years passing himself off as the true heir to the throne, claiming the royal birthmark on his hand as proof of this claim. Despite this, Georg had the same birthmark, and was brought back into power during a coup led by ![Wubbins](17,characters).

Wubbins and ![Goose Potato](18,characters) agreed that Freddy needed to be removed from power, and concocted a special poison to kill Freddy. Needing revolutionaries to back them, Wubbins scooped up ![Basil Nimble-Fingers](0,characters), ![Solomon Moonfall](1,characters), Georg, ![Rachel](16,characters), and ![Quinn](4,characters), placing them safely in vats of Goose Potato's special stasis formula. This healed them until they were ready to help carry out Wubbins' assassination plot against Freddy. Basil and Solomon were eager to join.

At a special royal brunch, ![Lord Dessert](20,characters) and ![some cockroaches](21,characters) escaped from the kitchen, creating a diversion that allowed Basil to poison Freddy's brunch. Though the revolutionaries were nearly defeated by Lord Dessert, they prevailed, and Freddy died shortly after.

Georg was restored to the throne not long afterwards, and despite not living up to the rather lofty expectations of Basil and Sol, the people of Knork rejoiced, celebrating and fornicating for days afterwards.

info.title: Wubbins' Quest: The Consecration of Kruska

text: ![Wubbins](17,characters) asked the party to check on the village of ![Kruska](9,settings), in southern Kolis. He said he had hired ![Reginald Wyyrmscale](26,characters) to watch over it, but there had been no news from the village in a concerning amount of time.

Shortly after departing for Kruska, the party found that ![Rachel](16,characters) had stowed away in their wagon. She explained that she wanted to buy something in ![Skutwug](11,settings), just south of Kruska. She didn't say what she wanted, just that "you can buy anything in Skutwug". Just before arriving in Kruska, the party found that ![Georg](8,characters) had also stowed away under their wagon.

Upon entering Kruska, the party found that ![all of the villagers were brains in jars](27,characters). The villagers, including ![the mayor, Brana](28,characters), and ![Furnhod, a young farmbrain](29,characters), told them that someone called "![Dr. Fear](30,characters)" had turned them all into brains. It had been roughly a year since this transformation happened, and they didn't recall what they looked like before. The villagers also told the party that Reginald Wyyrmscale was off in Skutwug, buying flakes for them to eat.
At night, ![the hands that terrorized the village](31,characters) came back, and the party had to fight them off. Furnhod nearly died, but ![Sol](0,characters) was able to save him.
There will be a moment when you should steal from someone.
The one who sleeps awaits a falling moon. Get there first.
You will come into great power.

info.title: Treasure of the Mysterious Underground Temple
